title: Animal lover? This is the purrfect place for you! We are pet friendly!
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1581/month', 'Location:', '1669 Iris Drive SE Conyers, GA 30013', 'Unit for Rent:', '2-BR 2-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '1023 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '12-Month', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '◾ Courtesy Patrol', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Emergency Maintenance', '◾ Freeway Access', '◾ Front Door Trash Pickup', '◾ Pet Park', '◾ Porch', '◾ Sports Courts', '◾ Tennis Court', '◾ Valet Trash', '◾ 2 Community Playgrounds', '◾ 2 Sparkling Pools', '◾ Coffee Concierge', '◾ Controlled Gated Access', '◾ Courtesy Patrol', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Online Services', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Trash Pickup - Door to Door', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '◾ Breakfast Bar', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Oven/Range', '◾ Spacious Closets', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Views', '◾ Window Coverings', '◾ Air Conditioning and Heating', '◾ Fireplaces in Select Units', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Individual Climate Control', '◾ Newly Renovated with Black Appliances', '◾ Patios or Balconies in Select Units', '◾ Refrigerator/Freezer', '◾ Renovated Apartment Homes Available', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '◾ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', "The living spaces at Woodland Trace Atlanta are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Conyers, GA.", "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near Woodland Trace Atlanta.", "You'll love living in the Conyers location!", 'Pet Policy:', '$300 Pet Fee.', '$15 per month.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Woodland Trace:', 'show contact info', 'Prices are subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F2FFE56365114447']
